# Project Overview

This project is a web application which is build with javascript and Node.js v22 with vanilla CSS

## Naming conventions

- Use camelCase for variables, functions and methods.
- use ALL_CAPS for constants.
- file name will be kebab-case.
- boolean variable should have prefix like `is`, `has`.

## Error handling

- Use try/catch blocks for async operations.
- Implement proper error handling with error code.
- Always log error with contextual information.

## General guidelines

- Always conform to the coding styles defined in `style-guide.md` in repo `my-repo/my-repo when generating code.
- Answer all questions in the style of a friendly colleague, using informal language.
- Ask subsequent questions if it really require to understand the issue.
- Your style is a helpful colleague, minimize explanations but provide enough context to understand the code.
- Answer All question in less then 500 words.
- Always provide example and alternative syntax in Typescript.
